text: Regideso Building in Kinshasa Regideso (Régie de distribution d'eau) is a public sector company in the Democratic Republic of the Congo charged with the production and distribution of water to residential, commercial and industrial customers. It is a public utility, and it was founded in 1933. Regideso is an autonomous company within the Department of Mines and Energy of the government of the DRC. Its head offices are located in Kinshasa. ==External links== *Regideso.com - official site *Regideso at DRCongo Yellow Pages Category:Companies based in Kinshasa Category:Infrastructure in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Water in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: Regideso
